price: (Allah) aravuga ati “Nimumanuke mwembi murivemo (mujye ku isi), bamwe muri mwe ari abanzi b’abandi (abantu bazaba abanzi ba Shitani, ndetse na we abe umwanzi wabo). Kandi umuyoboro wanjye nuramuka ubagezeho, uzakurikira uwo muyoboro wanjye ntazigera ayoba cyangwa ngo agorwe.”
arabic: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطَا مِنۡهَا جَمِيعَۢاۖ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ فَإِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدٗى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشۡقَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla ih'biṭā min'hā jamīʿan baʿḍukum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun fa-immā yatiyannakum minnī hudan famani ittabaʿa hudāya falā yaḍillu walā yashqā
